title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Publish Tiddler
text:

[[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/plugins/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw]] "},"$:/config/FileSystemPaths":{"title":"$:/config/FileSystemPaths","overwrite":"yes","author":"oeyoews","text":"[is[system]removeprefix[$:/]] [publish[private]addprefix[subwiki/private/]] [tag[todo]addprefix[subwiki/todo/]] [tag[Project]addprefix[subwiki/Project/]] [field:publish[article]addprefix[content/articles/]] [is[binary]addprefix[binary/]] [!is[system]addprefix[content/]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/enable-filestytempaths":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/enable-filestytempaths","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction","text":"<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/FileSystemPaths" $field="overwrite" $value="yes"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/explore":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/explore","text":"<$macrocall $name="tree" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}} /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter","text":"[!is[system]!is[binary]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/private","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon","text":" ","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/addtags":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/addtags","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define AddTags() <$select class="border-none rounded appearance-none p-0.5 capitalize bg-none cursor-pointer" tiddler=<> field='tags' tooltip='status' default="status"> \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter","text":" \define publishFilter() -[!is[system]publish[no]] \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define pushishNotFilter() [get[publish]match[no]] \end \define pushishFilter() [get[publish]match[yes]] \end \define opublish()
<$select class="o-publish border-none rounded appearance-none p-0.5 capitalize bg-transparent cursor-pointer" field="publish" tiddler=<> tooltip='status' default="status">
\end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config","text":"\define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" />
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style/publish":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style/publish","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\define hide-tiddler-controls() [data-tiddler-title="$(currentTiddler)$"] .tc-tiddler-controls {display: none;} <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}!match[http:]]"> .o-publish { display: none; } <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]count[]match[0]]"> .o-publish { display: none; } <$list filter="[field:publish[readonly]]"> <> <$list filter='[filed:publish[private]]'> [data-tiddler-title='{{!!title}}'] { border: 1px dashed red !important; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/tiddlers":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/tiddlers","text":"\define fb(label:label filter color:green) <$image source={{{ [[]addprefix[https://img.shields.io/badge/]] [<__label__>addsuffix[-]] $filter$ [[-]addsuffix<__color__>] +[join[]] }}} /> \end <> <> !! Private <$list filter="[field:publish[private]]" >
  • <$link><$view field="title"/>
    • !! Not Published <$list filter="[field:publish[no]]" >
  • <$link><$view field="title"/>
    • "}}}
